entries.name: Powerful Build
entries: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

entries.name: Loxodon Serenity
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

entries.name: Natural Armor
entries: When you aren't wearing armor, your AC is 12 plus your Constitution modifier.

entries.name: Trunk
entries: You can grasp things with your trunk, and it has a reach of 5 feet.

entries.name: Keen Smell
entries: You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception), Wisdom (Survival), and Intelligence (Investigation) checks that rely on smell.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Loxodon.
